Today the National Order Francisco Marroquín was delivered to 6 professors for their outstanding teaching work for the benefit of Guatemalan children.
The winners this year are the professors Joaquín Barrios, Eduardo Pérez, Napoleón Orozco, Marco de la Cruz, Nivia Alfaro and Miriam Gil.
I am pleased to distinguish respectable educators who have dedicated their lives to teaching. Congratulations teachers! http://t.co/YZdpCppsPP

The issue of migrant children will be discussed in the session of the Central American Integration System (SICA) this Friday in the Dominican Republic.
Guatemala will reiterate its request to address with a humanitarian vision the issue of irregular child migration in the Summit of Presidents of SICA
Guatemala, El Salvador and Honduras will go with a common position on the issue of migrant children to the regular meeting of #SICA.
The position of the three nations privileges the rights of unaccompanied migrant children and advocates family reunification.
